text:
I guess this is the right place to share the recent work and some good news. Excited to present the latest HubSpot theme <@UN7CEHC9X> and I have been working on lately. Now it’s officially published on the <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/ecosystem/marketplace/assets/themes/absolut-by-kohorta|HubSpot marketplace>. So you’re welcome to test it out, it’s free of charge.

The Absolut theme was made for the HubSpot Theme Challenge 2021. This week, we learned it is a second prize winner of the challenge. Thank you, HubSpot, for the recognition :pray:

<https://absolut.kohorta.co/>
